templates.name: Do you offer sale price adjustement?
templates.content: We can only honor price match discounts for orders placed within 24-48 hours of the sale dates.

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/pages/blenders-eyewear-store-locator

templates.name: Where does my order ship from?
templates.content: We strive to get your order to you quickly, so we ship from multiple locations in the U.S.

templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/pages/order-tracking

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here - https://www.blenderseyewear.com/pages/rewards

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 858-999-8023 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/blenders/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/BlendersEyewear/

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at mermaids@blenderseyewear.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I'm afraid we are not able to edit orders once placed but we do have a 30-minute cancellation window. Please contact us directly at mermaids@blenderseyewear.com and include your order number as well.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $50. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: What is the processing time for your prescription glasses?
templates.content:
The processing time for our Clear Reading Glasses is 7-10 business days and for our
Tinted Sunglasses, it's 15-20 business days.

templates.name: What are PureBlend lenses?
templates.content: PureBlend Lenses are lightweight and offer superior clarity and durability. They have added scratch-resistance, upgraded frame materials, and 100% UVA/UVB protection.

templates.name: I'm unable to see my reward points in my account
templates.content:
You may be experiencing a tech issue, if so, this troubleshooting should work:

First, make sure you're not signed into any shopping apps for faster checkout, such as Shop Pay, Apple Pay, Amazon Pay, etc. If you are, please sign out or opt to "checkout as guest."

Secondly, make sure you are signed in to your Blenders Account. You can login at checkout by the contact information section. Once you are logged in, you will see your rewards and can apply any points you have available.

Please keep in my mind you must be on the 'information' page at checkout to apply rewards.

templates.name: What's the difference between Polarized, Non-Polarized and PureBlend Lenses?
templates.content:
Good question! Polarized lenses have an additional anti-reflective coating of film to filter bright, reflected light as well as ambient light, reducing glare during driving, water sports, and other outdoor activites. 

Non-polarized lenses do not reduce glare as well as polarized lenses, but are equally efficient at protecting against UV rays and offer enhanced clarity when viewing LCD screens on digital devices.

Our new PureBlend lens is lightweight and offers superior clarity, and durability. It is available in polarized and non-polarized options.

I'm just here if you have other questions.

templates.name: How do I get the glasses prescribed?
templates.content:
We have created an RX Validator just for you! Please enter your prescription information and we'll let you know which pairs and lens types you will be able to choose from- https://blenderseyewear.attn.tv/sl/_dGP83sw

 Let me know if you have any questions, I'll be here!

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/pages/shipping-returns

templates.name: Can I pick up my shades that I ordered online in-store?
templates.content: Unfortunately, that's not an option we offer at the moment. We fulfill online orders from our fulfillment centers to allow for the fastest processing times. If you would like to make a purchase in-store, please use our Store Locator to find a store close to you: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/pages/blenders-eyewear-store-locator

templates.name: How do I submit a warranty claim?
templates.content: You can submit your warranty claim here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/pages/warranty

templates.name: Can I order custom shades?
templates.content: We unfortunately do not offer custom shades. Sorry about that!

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at mermaids@blenderseyewear.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help! I'd recommend checking out our fit guides for each collection offering and suggestions based on your face shape/frame size here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/pages/fit-guide

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-3 business days. Please note that the processing time for Clear Reading Glasses takes 7-10 business days and 15-20 business days for our Tinted prescription glasses. We usually ship via USPS or FedEx and once shipped it will take 2-4 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Where's the first Millenia?
templates.content: I'm afraid the Millenia is a discontinued style. I would highly recommend checking out Millenia X2 here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/collections/millenia-x2

templates.name: Refund/Replacement order
templates.content: Thank you for sharing this information! For these types of requests, please email champions@blenderseyewear.com or call us at 858-999-8023. Our customer support team there will be able to best assist you. Please note that our team is available Monday - Friday 9:00am - 5:00pm PST.

templates.name: Conversation closer
templates.content:
You're welcome! If there's anything else I can help you with, feel free to shoot me a text. In the meantime check out our best sellers here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/collections/best-sellers

Have a great day!

templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/pages/fit-guide

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can initiate your return here: https://returns.blenderseyewear.com

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can apply for our affiliate program here: https://www.blenderseyewear.com/pages/join-the-blenders-team

templates.name: How do I redeem my points?
templates.content: Redeeming your points is easy! Just log in to your account, head to the rewards dashboard, and choose how you want to use your points. When you're ready to check out, select your reward, and your discount will be applied automatically.
